title: Large Andiron
medium: watercolor, gouache, and pen and ink on paper
dimensions:
overall: 30.3 x 22.9 cm (11 15/16 x 9 in.)
Original IAD Object: overall height: 49"; ball: 6" diameter; top of column: 3 1/4" diameter; base: 6" wide; legs: 7" high, 19" wide; extension piece: 35" long
attribution: Gordon Saltar and Edward L. Loper
